meanings.sent1: The nauseant smell of rotten eggs made me feel sick.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk had a nauseant effect on my stomach.
meanings.sent3: The nauseant odor from the garbage can was enough to make anyone lose their appetite.
meanings.sent4: The nauseant images in the horror movie left me feeling queasy.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the medicine was so nauseant that I couldn't bear to swallow it.

meanings.sent1: She accidentally ingested a nauseant that made her feel unwell.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an anti-nauseant to counteract the effects of the medication.
meanings.sent3: The prankster slipped a nauseant into his friend's drink as a practical joke.
meanings.sent4: The nauseant used in the experiment caused the lab mice to become sick.
meanings.sent5: The nauseant emitted by the chemical spill caused an evacuation of the area.
